abstract: The latest “intrusion” tactic, making good money in worthless options
snippet: The latest “intrusion” tactic, making good money in worthless options
lead_paragraph: The latest enforcement action by the Securities and Exchange Commission relating to “intruded” brokerage accounts has a nice switch: In addition to having the defrauded investors buy shares of thinly traded companies you never heard of, this group, of three traders from India, also made good money trading in worthless options of a company almost everyone knows: Google.

headline.main: Quadruple Your Money in Worthless Options
